word: So the throne of glory represents the kingdom of glory, and this kingdom is referred to in the Saviour's words, “When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory; and before him shall be gathered all nations.” [Matthew 25:31, 32.] This kingdom is yet future. It is not to be set up until the second advent of Christ.
